results.output:
Here's a six-line poem with all words beginning with 's', attempting to make a haircut epic:

Silken strands, sweet Sophia's splendor,
Snipped! Stern scissors strike surrender!
Swooning, spurned, she softly sighs,
Seeing shorter strands subside.
Scorned stylist, secretly scheming,
Shapes such savage, sacred screaming!
